mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as value FROM CPF_CASE_HISTORY
SELECT count(1) as value FROM CPF_CASE_HISTORY WHERE ID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update cpf_case_history set relate_status=#{relateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_id=#{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, folder_id=#{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id in (${idStr})
